00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "ViscousCFDTetShapeWrapper.hpp"

00036 #include "QualityAssessor.hpp"
00037 #include "InstructionQueue.hpp"
00038 #include "TagVertexMesh.hpp"
00039 #include "TrustRegion.hpp"
00040 #include "TerminationCriterion.hpp"

00042 #include "PMeanPTemplate.hpp"
00043 #include "TQualityMetric.hpp"
00044 #include "AddQualityMetric.hpp"
00045 
00046 #include "TShapeB1.hpp"
00047 #include "TShapeNB1.hpp"
00048 #include "TShapeSizeOrientB1.hpp"
00049 #include "TShapeSizeOrientNB1.hpp"
00050 
00051 #include "IdealShapeTarget.hpp"
00052 #include "RefMeshTargetCalculator.hpp"
00053 #include "ReferenceMesh.hpp"
00054 #include "TetDihedralWeight.hpp"
00055 #include "RemainingWeight.hpp"
00056 
00057 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00058 
00059 void ViscousCFDTetShapeWrapper::run_wrapper( MeshDomainAssoc* mesh_and_domain,
00060                                              ParallelMesh* pmesh,
00061                                              Settings* settings,
00062                                              QualityAssessor* qa,
00063                                              MsqError& err )
00064 {
00065   InstructionQueue q;
00066   
00067   // Set up barrier metric to see if mesh contains inverted elements
00068   TShapeB1 mu_b;
00069   IdealShapeTarget w_ideal;
00070   TQualityMetric barrier( &w_ideal, &mu_b );
00071   
00072   // Check for inverted elements in the mesh
00073   QualityAssessor inv_check( &barrier );
00074   inv_check.disable_printing_results();
00075   q.add_quality_assessor( &inv_check, err );  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00076   q.run_common( mesh_and_domain, pmesh, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00077   q.remove_quality_assessor( 0, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00078   const QualityAssessor::Assessor* inv_b = inv_check.get_results( &barrier );
00079   const bool use_barrier = (0 == inv_b->get_invalid_element_count());
00080   
00081   // Create remaining metric instances
00082   TShapeNB1 mu;
00083   TShapeSizeOrientNB1 mu_o;
00084   TShapeSizeOrientB1 mu_ob;
00085   
00086   // Select which target metrics to use
00087   TMetric *mu_p, *mu_op;
00088   if (use_barrier) {
00089     mu_p = &mu_b;
00090     mu_op = &mu_ob;
00091   }
00092   else {
00093     mu_p = &mu;
00094     mu_op = &mu_o;
00095   }
00096   
00097 
00098   // Set up target and weight calculators
00099   Mesh* mesh = mesh_and_domain->get_mesh();
00100   TagVertexMesh init_mesh( err, pmesh ? (Mesh*)pmesh : mesh );  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00101   ReferenceMesh ref_mesh( &init_mesh );
00102   RefMeshTargetCalculator w_init( &ref_mesh );
00103   TetDihedralWeight c_dihedral( &ref_mesh, dCutoff, aVal );
00104   RemainingWeight c_remaining( &c_dihedral );
00105   
00106   // Create objective function
00107   TQualityMetric metric1( &w_ideal, &c_dihedral,  mu_p  );
00108   TQualityMetric metric2( &w_init,  &c_remaining, mu_op );
00109   AddQualityMetric of_metric( &metric1, &metric2, err );  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00110   PMeanPTemplate obj_func( 1.0, &of_metric );
00111   
00112   // Create optimizer
00113   TrustRegion solver( &obj_func );
00114   TerminationCriterion term, ptc;
00115   term.add_iteration_limit( iterationLimit );
00116   term.add_absolute_vertex_movement( maxVtxMovement );
00117   ptc.add_iteration_limit( pmesh ? parallelIterations : 1 );
00118   solver.set_inner_termination_criterion( &term );
00119   solver.set_outer_termination_criterion( &ptc );
00120   
00121   // Create instruction queue
00122   qa->add_quality_assessment( &metric1 );
00123   qa->add_quality_assessment( &metric2 );
00124   qa->add_quality_assessment( &of_metric );
00125   q.add_quality_assessor( qa, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00126   q.set_master_quality_improver( &solver, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00127   q.add_quality_assessor( qa, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00128 
00129   // Optimize mesh
00130   q.run_common( mesh_and_domain, pmesh, settings, err ); MSQ_CHKERR(err);  
00131 }
00132 
00133 } // namespace MESQUITE_NS
